context.title: Algorithms
context.description: This is the start page for crypto plug-ins belonging to the category Algorithms. The subpages here contain the settings for plug-ins available in this category. Not every crypto plug-in does provide its own preferences.

context.title: Analysis
context.description: This is the start page for crypto plug-ins belonging to the category Analysis. The subpages here contain the settings for plug-ins available in this category. Not every crypto plug-in does provide its own preferences.

context.title: Cryptography
context.description: This is the general category for cryptographic settings of all kind. The subpages contain general settings for different crypto plug-ins, e.g. classical alphabets and the keystores for modern algorithms can be configured in this category. Normally these settings are used in more than one plug-in.

context.title: Editors
context.description: This is the start page for the Editors available in JCrypTool. Subpages contain specific preferences for every editor (if available).

context.title: Games
context.description: This is the start page for crypto plug-ins belonging to the category Games. The subpages here contain the settings for plug-ins available in this category. Not every crypto plug-in provides its own preferences.

context.title: Visualizations
context.description: This is the start page for crypto plug-ins belonging to the Visualizations. The subpages here contain the settings for plug-ins available in this category. Not every crypto plug-in does provide its own preferences.

context.title: General
context.description: This page lets you choose general JCrypTool settings as well as the JCrypTool language. The language is automatically based on the regional settings of your operating system, but can be changed here. You have to restart JCrypTool after switching to another language.
